reviews.name: Brooke Williams

He was determined to find the root of the problem and provide a solution to have our home back up and running for Christmas with our family. I can?t recommend him enough for your plumbing/ sewer problems. We will definitely reach out to him for any future needs.

reviews.reviewText: Carter did an excellent job installing a water pressure regulator. Other plumbers gave me a huge quote on installing one and Carter was honest about the cost which was half of what everyone said . Very thorough.

reviews.reviewText:
Carter provided a thorough inspection to diagnose the root cause of my issues, provided a quote (which i agreed to), and performed a quality and timely repair.

Excellent customer service! I will definitely use again for any other plumbing needs.

reviews.reviewText: Always a great experience with Carter. Responsive, prompt, informed and willing to make the time, even on short notice (calendar permitting). Prices are fair, work is done right. As a customer, I feel like I am getting good, informed advice. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewText:
Absolutely outstanding service from CJ Plumbing! They recently replaced my main water line, and I couldn't be happier with the results. From start to finish, they were incredibly professional, kind, and efficient. The quality of their workmanship is top-notch, and they treated my yard with the utmost care, leaving it as they found it. Remarkably, they even took the time to meticulously restore the grass where they had to dig, leaving no trace of their work behind and you can hardly tell I had my waterline replaced. I highly recommend CJ Plumbing to anyone in need of plumbing services. They truly went above and beyond for me.

Anyone looking for a plumber, I highly recommend giving CJ a call.

reviews.name: Chris Rasco

reviews.name: Steve Hartman
reviews.reviewText: CJ is excellent at troubleshooting the problem.  I trust him to accurately identify and repair the problem.

reviews.reviewText: Carter is an absolute gem, we are so glad to know him. All the ?????????? Reviews can?t lie - top notch service!

He spent two days working it and even found a break further up the line that he repaired.

The man does quality work and stands behind it.  Not sure what else you can ask for.

reviews.reviewText:
A stain appeared on my ceiling that was caused by a leaking drain. I
called CJ's Plumbing because of all the good reviews and I'm happy to say the reviews are true. He answered the phone and scheduled the service as soon as possible.
Carter investigated all over the house until he found the source of the leak. He was determined to find the root of the problem and was patient as he searched. He was professional, upfront and honest, and helpful in that he not only fixed the problem, but also provided me with the name of a drywall person that could make repairs to the ceiling.
I could tell he didn't just care about the job, but also about helping people which isn't always the case in some businesses.
I appreciate his integrity and will definitely use his services in the future if I need them. I would definitely recommend him to friends and family.

reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend C J plumbing. Carter,the owner,is courteous,punctual and very communicative.The price was reasonable and fair,especially considering the quality of his work. Made double sure there were no leaks before leaving. I?ll use again!!!

reviews.reviewText: I called on CJ to repair a faucet that a ?handyman? improperly installed, to locate a leak my painter had discovered, and install a project piece vanity. I will be using this company again to install gas logs and replace some outdated sink faucets and I have no doubt I will be pleased with that work also.

reviews.reviewText: CJ plumbing and gas is amazing. This is the kindest most honest man you will meet. He explained everything he was doing and made sure I understood and why it was the best choice. I will be using him for all future projects as well as recommending him to all of my friends and family. Thank you so much.

reviews.reviewText: I could not have asked for better service.  He was diligent about making sure the repairs were done right, and future-proofed. He stayed until the job was done,  which went late.  There is no other plumber that i will call again.

reviews.name: Shane Virgin
reviews.reviewText: Was very thorough in evaluating the work to be done. Took time to explain what needed to be done and why    Was responsive and made sure to get back to us timely.

reviews.name: Shaun Mazur
reviews.reviewText:
Woke up yesterday morning to discover a leak was coming water heater which damaged my bathroom ceiling.  Water reclamation service (DryTech) got us in touch with Carter. He got on the phone and told us what we could do prior to him coming out to mitigate any more damage. He got to house around 330 and had everything he needed to replace and/or fix the problem. After asking for his professional opinion, we decided to go ahead and replace the water heater. Keep in mind, it?s now 430ish on a Friday afternoon. He said he would rather go ahead and start the job as opposed to waiting until Monday. In his words, ?I don?t want to leave you with a ticking time bomb.?  The entire job took about four hours to complete. Carter didn?t leave the house until 9 or so when it was all said and done.

I don?t know of many companies that would have done what Carter did. He is professional, courteous, clean, and more importantly, trustworthy. I have ZERO issues in using CJ Plumbing and Gas again or referring them to friends and family.

reviews.name: Greg Lancaster
reviews.reviewText: I called Carter about a leaking water heater. He told me he would be at my house by 2:30 PM the same day. He was early, diagnosed the problem and made the repair. I?ve used him three times since my initial emergency for some plumbing updates and he has continued to impress with every visit!!  I would absolutely recommend him!

reviews.name: adje
reviews.reviewText: Thank you Carter for installing my whole house water filter. You provided excellent service along with beating your competitors price by $115.00. Thank you again.

reviews.name: Tim Calhoun
reviews.reviewText:
Carter was excellent to work with! He was right on time and quickly diagnosed my main issue. He openly admitted there *might" be a 2nd issue, but there would be a different need than he could provide (e.g tile work), so he prepared me for that possible next step. Good news - as of 1 month later I have ZERO evidence of any water and Carter's plumbing work saved the day - and I haven't forked over any $$$ for extra tile/construction work!!!
From a value perspective, I don't have any comparable dollars. That said, he was very transparent how he charged and provided a clear bill. I did not at all feel like he took advantage of the job based upon the work he performed and time he spent. He was quite thorough, and seemingly very honest and transparent in his diagnosis and solution, and quite knowledgeable of his trade!!!
On top of his work, he was friendly and courteous. He was dog-friendly and was very affectionate to our sweet Peggy. ??
Thank you, Carter, for great work!

reviews.name: Jessica Gore
reviews.reviewText: We had an absolutely amazing experience with Carter. We had a nasty clog that gave us fits for quite awhile. Carter came by shortly after calling him. He worked for so long on our problem and even worked on other problems he found while working on the initial problem. He was thorough and explained  what he was doing and why which we greatly appreciated. If we ever have another issue, he?ll be our first call. I?d recommend him 10/10 to anyone.

reviews.name: Marlon Brown
reviews.reviewText: Detailed

reviews.name: Michele Ferrantelli
reviews.reviewText: Hardworking, HONEST, and dependable, reliable, knowledgeable, professional...I could go on for a while!  Carter quickly responded to my residence due to an under the slab pipe leak (which had water seeping up through my floors).  He thoroughly explained what the "approach and fix" would be and set me up with all the additional help (detection and remediation)I'd need.  He went straight to work on the leak and did not stop until it was fixed.  I would absolutely, highly recommend!

reviews.name: Philip Pellegra
reviews.reviewText:
I highly recommend this company. Carter came out to give us a quote and was very professional. We went with him because he definitely knew what he was talking about and was much more reasonable than some of the big name companies. He changed out 30 foot of cast iron rotted pipe over to pvc and replaced pressure reducing valve and installed a new cut off valve. Needless to see, everything is working great now. He is my permanent plumber now.

Philip P

reviews.name: Russell Roberts
reviews.reviewText: Would give 10 stars if I could. CJ provides quality service with professionalism. Explains and breaks down what the issue is to the customer. Will do work with him in the future.

reviews.name: Roger Smith
reviews.reviewText: Carter was prompt and very professional. He did excellent work and it was much appreciated. I will be using him in the future for sure. He will always be at the top of my list. Thanks again Carter!

reviews.name: Susan Jensen
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend CJ Plumbing and Gas. Carter is prompt, does quality work, and offers fair prices. I am so pleased to find a plumber that I can count on and trust.

reviews.name: Jason Cole
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely a great  plumber! His work has cut our water bill over half the last few months. We will never call another plumber again.

reviews.name: Holly Gibbs
reviews.reviewText: Carter has been out to our house for a variety of reasons from indoor plumbing to irrigation system issues.  He?s also worked on my parent?s RV plumbing!  He definitely knows what he?s doing, reasonable, and timely.  I?ve recommended him to several friends and I wouldn?t do that if I didn?t trust him and believe he was the best man for the job.

reviews.name: Todd Tracy
reviews.reviewText: Carter has helped us complete projects in preparation of the sale of our home. Whenever we contacted him about a job, he scheduled us quickly and arrived on time. Carter?s prices are competitive and his work is solid.

reviews.name: Michelle Tracy
reviews.reviewText: We?ve used Carter multiple times in our prior home and our current one. He is professional, reliable, and friendly. He schedules you quickly, all work is done in a timely manner, and he always cleans up after his work is completed. I highly recommend him - you can?t go wrong!

reviews.name: Lisa Shapiro
reviews.reviewText: Robert & Lisa Shapiro highly recommend C J Plumbing and Gas Alabaster (Carter Johnson) for any all plumbing or gas repairs or installs. We requested a list of items to be repaired, checked & installed. As with any request for repairs, the list grew once he arrived. Carter was knowledgeable & pleasant with the additional repairs. He worked two solid days to ensure all was in proper working order. Carter is the only Plumber & Gas Fitter we will contact. We are elated with his expertise & excellent customer service.

reviews.name: Nathan Weis
reviews.reviewText: Called Carter on a Saturday to come take a look at a leak in my ceiling.   He came over in less than 30mins from the call.   After a very thorough investigation, he diagnosed the issue and pointed out some other issues that really needed attention.  He is very detail oriented and very helpful.   He fixed the issues and now I have a house that is in perfect plumbing order.   Thank you Carter for your quick response and an awesome job on my house.   I highly reccomend Carter for any plumbing needs.

reviews.name: Joshua Akers
reviews.reviewText: I had issues with toilets and showers emptying. Cox Plumbing was able to get everything fixed. They even came to my house the same day that I contacted them! Great Service!

reviews.name: Jonathan Barber
reviews.reviewText: Had a sudden leak at the main water supply entering the house.  Called Cox plumbing. They were available and arrived within an hour.  They explained the process and had it fixed within an hour.  New line needed from outside through the wall to interior shut off.  Good price and fantastic service.  I?ll definitely use Cox Plumbing again.  Very pleased.

reviews.name: Monica Stalling
reviews.reviewText:
Cox Plumbing  Solutions,  Their Staff is Caring , Professional  & Very Knowledgeable,  they  fix my water heater and they was on time and didn't take long. Highly  recommend  wish they had 10 Stars.

Monica Stalling

reviews.name: brittney cummings
reviews.reviewText: Rex was very commutative. His work was excellent. Very polite. I would highly recommend him and his company. If I ever need plumbing work done i would use his company again. And very reasonable pricing. He has gone above and beyond for me to get my plumbing back up to par. Thank Rex for all you done I highly appreciate you.

reviews.name: Gringl?s
reviews.reviewText: Rex did an awesome job! He also went above and beyond what anyone would do and fixed a duct while he was in the crawlspace, put the feet back on my tub, pulled a rag out of my garbage disposal, and removed some dead rats out of the crawl space that he came across =O~. Not only that but he was polite and good with the kids and didn't overcharge. I'll definitely call him when I need something else!

reviews.name: Chad Harrelson
reviews.reviewText: Rex came out late in the evening very promptly to fix our water leak. Quick response time and great work. I would highly recommend his services!

reviews.name: Karol Layton

reviews.reviewText:

reviews.reviewText: Extremely pleased with our experience!  We needed a cartridge replaced in our bathtub faucet, but we couldn't get the old cartridge out.  Brittany was kind and helpful on the phone and was able to send someone out very quickly.  Bryan was so polite and friendly and efficient!  He did a fantastic job explaining why it was stuck, what he was doing, and the potential issues they could run into.  They prepared me for the worst but delivered the best!  Completed the whole project, including travel time to get the replacement part, in an hour and a half.  Would definitely recommend Hobbs!!

reviews.name: Will Hebert
reviews.reviewText: They arrived at the earliest available and quickly fixed my toilet at a fair price.

reviews.reviewText: I called Hobbs Plumbing spoke with a nice lady named Brittany she scheduled me for the same day I called. He checked our water pressure it was high.  I suspected it was our PRV and it was.  Bryan relocated our PRV near our water meter instead of at our house in the crawl space. I?m very pleased with the service we received. I will definitely  will use Hobbs Plumbing when needed again.

reviews.reviewText:
I would like to thank the customer service of Hobbs Plumbing. I had no hot water and the prospects of getting it fixed was a week or longer. I talked with Brittney and she said if she could get someone out earlier she would call me back. Brittney called back and said a technician had finished a job early and would send him out. Bryan arrived and fixed the problem and some others he found. Thank you Bryan for being so helpful and courteous. Would highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing if you have a plumbing issue.
J. Givins

reviews.reviewText: "I would highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing LLC, to anyone in the Auburn/Opelika/Lee County area. I was out searching for a plumber to do some repairs at a rental property of mine . As I pulled into the parking  lot this young man walked out, I explained my situation to him(Bryan), he said yes we can take care of that for you. This company , were professional, diagnosed the problem quickly, and finished the job in a short amount of time. Thank you again Hobbs Plumbing LLC, for doing such a GREAT job.

So many other times they have come out due to old pipes that they have always gone above and beyond for my family. Highly recommend Hobbs Plumbing for any and all plumbing needs, They are amazing!

Job well done. Polite, kind. And good pricing.
I highly reccomend

reviews.reviewText: I would recommend Hobbs Plumbing to anyone and everyone. They show up when they say they will and are knowledgeable and courteous. Always a great experience.

reviews.reviewText: Cannot say enough good about this company! Mr. Hobbs was prompt, professional, and did a great job for an amazing price. Will definitely recommend over and over again.

reviews.reviewText: Awesome experience with Hobb?s Plumbing! Got in touch with them yesterday and they were able to fix my issue today! Great service with very reasonable pricing!

reviews.name: Carter Pitts
reviews.reviewText: Excellent Services. My wife and I had Blake and his team completely redo all of our plumbing and we were completely satisfied. Hard worker with unbeatable pricing. We will always be using Blake for all our plumbing jobs from now on!

reviews.reviewText: I came home from vacation during spring break to a leak in my hot water heater... I called maybe 30 plumbers and none could get me in that day. He took a look at the problem and quoted me a very fair price and became replacing it right then. He even took the time to rip the wet carpet up and set up a fan for me. He also repaired a sink and a toilet I had been having trouble with. I would highly recommend this company for all your plumbing needs. He is great and is a stand up guy!

reviews.name: B Yarbrough
reviews.reviewText: This review is about the owner. I called about an issue we were having and the owner informed me he was out of town with family and the rest of his team was booked, but he gave me the names of 3 other plumbers he recommends.  He could have just said he was unavailable and ended the call, but he still tried to help. That level of professionalism should be the norm, but sadly, is not. It was probably a small thing to him, but meant a lot to me.

reviews.name: Anne Bekken
reviews.reviewText: We used Hatcher plumbing for a total revamp of our 1960?s house?s plumbing. He gutted the old drains and replaced all of the cast iron with a completely redesigned pvc drain system all the way to the septic tank.  He designed a new vent system so that no pipes would show up through the roof sections at the front of the house. He also created a new water supply system throughout the house using PEX. He even replaced some pvc on our pool pump! Sims gave a lot of great advice along the way and helped us overcome several obstacles in our remodeling. We will be having him return shortly to hook up all of the fixtures as soon as the drywall is complete. Sims is very personable and passionate about doing quality work.  Hatcher Plumbing has done us a fantastic service!

reviews.name: Eugene Kistol
reviews.reviewText: Very professional and quality work! If you want a bad plumber Mr. Hatcher ain't it. Hes a good plumber with good work ethic, I definitely recommend him!

reviews.name: Levi Melangton
reviews.reviewText: Great service

reviews.reviewText: Cody was very  professional and did an excellent job! We will never use anyone else! Very prompt and professional work, way beyond our expectations! Thank you so much!

reviews.reviewText: Such amazing service!!!! My go to for any all plumbing. Very professional, I recommend for any and all plumbing needs. Roll Tide!

reviews.reviewText: My kitchen and bathroom sink was backing up and I reached out to Cody. Within seconds he called me back and immediately came to check it out! reviews.reviewText: Cody changed 2 drains out in my bathtubs that were difficult to get to. I feel like I got good value for my money. He was also really patient with my old, cranky dog that hates visitors. He was respectful of my home, he tried his best to keep it clean despite being covered in dirt from crawling under the house. He left his boots outside without me having to ask. I will use this company again in the future for whatever issues may arise.

reviews.reviewText: Cody is truly the kindest most respectful man you?ll ever have work for you! I truly couldn?t recommend him more!

reviews.reviewText: Mama's boy was able to arrive quickly and efficiently diagnose and repair our hot water pipe which was leaking inside the wall

reviews.name: Chuck Langer
reviews.reviewText:
My wife Christy and I bought our home 3 years ago. Not being from Ft. Payne we have not yet established professional relationships with contractors in our area.

When our septic pump/system began to fail we were at a loss. The few reputable contractors in . Ft. Payne were unavailable for weeks?

Cody made a trip 70 miles out of his way to come up and check out our problem. He was able to get things to operate until the necessary pump and other necessary materials were secured.

A second trip up from Oxford/Anniston was made. After experiencing some additional issues a third trip was made. The work was completed professionally, confidently and the level of follow through start to finish was impressive.

Our family has found our Plummer/Septic guy for life. Professional attention, attitude while performing this work seemed effortless. The finished product surpassed our expectations. The value of this experience and now knowing that regardless what we might encounter regarding plumbing or septic issues we now have a go to company with excellent personal that we know will be there. We sincerely appreciate a job very well done.

reviews.name: Narda Christian
reviews.reviewText: This company offers great service.  Came out the same day my husband called.  Got the repair done in a day. Cody, Skylar and the rest of the crew were very professional.  I will definitely use this company for all my plumbing needs.

reviews.name: Mike Mcnary
reviews.reviewText: Cody and his helper came out on an emergency call, and worked to the we hours of the morning fixing a broken line from the well to the house. They stayed and finished the job to make sure we had water again. I will use and recommend Mama's Boy Plumbing and Septic  again. Thank you Cody.

He was on time, which is unthinkable in this area. His expertise and quotes were outstanding. He fixed our septic tank issue, on time, as quoted. I will only call him for my plumbing needs going forward. I feel a lot the contractors in this area could learn from him on how to treat customers.

reviews.name: Landon Smith
reviews.reviewText: If you are having septic tank problems, Cody is the man to call.  My lines were blocked and Cody came out the same day I called and had me back up and ready by the end of the day.  Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Bri Stutts
reviews.reviewText: Cody and his team were great they did MY WHOLE HOUSE and it?s all in great working condition 10 out of 10 thank you Cody ?

reviews.name: Seterria Stringer
reviews.reviewText: These guys are awesome and very knowledgeable! John?s Home Services provided excellent customer service, quick response, and quality work! We initially were going to have our ceiling damage repaired by a guy our friends recommended, but the quote he gave was way over the top and included items we didn?t want fixed. They also did not have the ability to match our plaster design, requiring removal of the entire drywall.

John came out within 48 hours of us reaching out was able to give us detailed step by step instructions on what we needed to do to cut down on cost of repairs, and his plasterer Anthony was able to perform a ceiling patch and plaster match, which reduced the overall cost of the project by a significant amount. Anthony was extremely skilled and matched our ceiling pattern perfectly within 2 hours (he patched about a 8x16 foot hole and plastered it). John and his assistant were back out to seal the water stains and paint our ceilings as soon as the plaster dried?they were quick and were able to not drip any ceiling paint on any of our brand new floors, which we certainly would not have been able to do ourselves!

Overall, great customer service, quick repairs,  and great cost! I?ve attached pictures to this post because I?m still amazed that they were able to perfectly match our crazy from the 60?s plaster pattern.

reviews.name: Kim Isbell
reviews.reviewText: Tristan is by far the most professional, honest plumber out there! I?ve used his services twice in 2 months for a toilet that was clogging, and both times he was here within 30-45 minutes and it didn?t cost an arm and a leg. I knew before the very first call to Tristan that the clogged toilet was old and probably just needed to be replaced. But when I had to call him a second time to come unclog the toilet, I knew that it was just time to replace it. I talked to him about installing a new toilet, got a quote, and expected to have to wait at least a week or more before he would be able to get back out to put in the new toilet, but nope! He was back two days later and had the new toilet installed in a little more than an hour! I would not hesitate to recommend him to family, friends, and strangers. They made sure I understood all my options clearly before drafting my invoice. Once the paperwork was done they got to work immediately. Even though my situation was a little more complex than the average swap out, they problem solved quickly and got everything installed within a few hours, and took the time to show me how everything worked. They even had to reconfigure my washer and dryer set up to accommodate the new water heater, and they didn?t leave until they ensured everything was working as it should for me. I?ll be recommending them to anyone I know with plumbing issues and I?ll be a return customer in the future for sure! Thanks again Tristan and Nathaniel!

So I called, and almost begged (lol) for help. She called Jo, and YES, they could get to me that day!
They kept in contact on when they would arrive, and when Jo arrived, his work ethic was spot on!
He explained everything so we could understand completely! He also discovered our fill lines were done for, and set things for them to be moved, file permits, and make things so simple for us!
Him, and his helper, were freakin' amazing!
And the price! I was dreading it. Especially since I was worked in, and I was needing a full pump!
From beautiful etiquette,  to being so informative,  you can't go wrong!!!
This will be someone we use, for the business, and personal, for as long as they are around!

The next day (7/15/21) the secretary called and scheduled the work for the 19th. The weather was not very good but Joe and his helper arrived early and got right to work. Their knowledge, experience, and work ethic were top notch. They worked hard and continued even when the rain arrived and lasted for a few hours. reviews.name: Rickey Davis
reviews.reviewText: The entire experience from start to finish was great! We were having a pool installed and unfortunately could not locate the septic lines . During the pool Dig the one line was found unfortunately . I called Scott's that day and Joe called me within minutes of the call to the office. He told me he would be out the next afternoon at a certain time . The following day he showed up at the exact time as promised . He went over all repair options and gave his expert opinion which was willing to cater to budget and our needs. He was up front about everything and was not just trying to make a sale to us . We decided we would go ahead with an entirely new system . He called that evening and started the permit process , And followed up with me to let me know when he expected to be out and as soon as the permit was approved. He and the crew showed up exactly the date and time for the install and finished earlier than my expectations and for the price he quoted with no up charges like some companies tend to do. He also went a step further and moved an old propane tank around for me. If I could give a higher rating than 5 stars I absolutely would. I have always been a do it myself person because that is my nature. That being said Scott's has gained a customer for life and I will promote them to anyone.

reviews.name: Paul Parker
reviews.reviewText: I don't really know how to express my gratitude to this company... My family just got back from vacation and my daughter was taking a shower when the drain started to overflow... I called 4 or 5 different places and all of them wanted to charge me to clean the the septic tank ( which was done two years ago)...I didn't know and no one told me about it having a filter (that should be cleaned every 6 months) i was short on money because of the vacation and the owner of this company walked me through what to look for and how to fix it... He even said he would come out FREE OF CHARGE to show me where the filter top was... After 2 days i got it fixed myself.... This company is a cut above the rest and not just looking to make money

reviews.name: Jennifer Wright
reviews.reviewText: Fast and friendly service. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.name: Laura Heilman
reviews.reviewText: We are a repeat customer and are never disappointed with Scott?s service. This time, we needed a water heater replacement. Jamie and Caleb were courteous, knowledgeable and efficient. Got the job done and we are very happy with it.

reviews.name: Bradley Ashley
reviews.reviewText: Scott's Plumbing is THE BEST.   Great prices, courteous, professional and ALWAYS responsive.  My family has used them for many years.  We wouldn't call anyone else.  From faucets, toilets, leaks, water heaters...Scott's does it all!   Call Scott's....you won't be disappointed!!!

reviews.name: Mike B
reviews.reviewText: Simply the best!! From initial contact, to follow-up and coordination of new field lines and diverter valve install, Scott, Joe, and the crew delivered the best service anyone could ask for. I received several calls along the way to keep me updated, primarily because of the heavy rain delay, so that I knew when to expect them and they were here when they said they would be. Job well done!!

reviews.name: Jaqueline Butler
reviews.reviewText: Earlier this year, my toilet broke down and had to reach out to 'a plumber'. It wasn't enough to replace, especially it being not too old, so I wanted it rebuilt. Either I found companies that didn't have time to come by, wanted me to take a different route (higher price, easier for them) or were simply out of my price comfort....until I found Scott's. The guys came, did the job, even stayed late, cleaned up & made me happy. Then I got the bill, and kept smiling. With getting ready to remodel I had no qualms on who to call. They've been to my house several times over the past months installing a water heater, helping with all the plumbing needs to remodel my bathroom and even helped hunt down a false leak, gratis (broken water jug). Every time it's been quick scheduling, great work, nice prices & I've been happy. My pup runs to greet them every time the van pulls up....it's not just mama that has to be happy.

reviews.name: Catrice Kenerly
reviews.reviewText: Great Service! Thanks so much for your quick response professional work!!!

reviews.name: Lambert Tire Co
reviews.reviewText: Not only did they fix our sewage issue they also solved a plumbing mystery for us. Well done!

reviews.name: Elyse Wheeler
reviews.reviewText: It may sound like a Boy Scout list but the young men who provide service for Scott's Plumbing are outstanding. They have always been polite, personable and friendly. They show care for the property and the house while providing excellent service. I have had them at my home for a variety of issues from replacing a water heater to installing an outside faucet on a deck 15 feet off the ground. The latest incident was a leak in the water system from the water meter. Not an easy task but they found it and fixed the leak in short order. I am so pleased to be associate with them.

reviews.name: Robert Redrow
reviews.reviewText: I called Scott Saturday morning after discovering a pipe had burst in my front yard. His team was there within an hour and promptly made the repair for a reasonable price.

reviews.name: Jason Linney
reviews.reviewText: Great customer service. Showed up when they said they would. Good prices. The install looked and preformed as expected. I would use them for any plumbing issues.

reviews.name: Adel Abunawass
reviews.reviewText: I had an old leaking water heater that needed to be replaced. Scott?s Plumbing came on the same day and replaced my water heater.  Josh & Jaime (the two technician who came to my home) were professional, courteous, and kind.  They gave me several quotes for the the different options possible.  Once I decided on an option, they went to work and did a great job in a timely fashion.  Josh and Jaime removed the old water heater, installed the new one, cleaned the space, and made sure that all my questions were answered.  They ensured the work was done to my satisfaction. Thank you, Josh & Jaime, and Scott?s Plumbing for doing great work!

reviews.name: Philip Allen
reviews.reviewText: 5 star work from a 5 star company. They worked me into their schedule within 24 hours and provided thorough, quality work at a good price. They didn?t leave until after they made sure all my questions were answered and I was satisfied with the job. I would definitely recommend this company. I appreciate when companies care about their customers as much as they care about their specialty.

reviews.name: Baby Kat13
reviews.reviewText: They are amazing people and they have great prices. I wouldnt use another plumber.

reviews.name: babyboy30116
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely awesome! Came right out, gave and good price and were really nice. I would recommend him to my friends.

reviews.name: Leighann Farmer
reviews.reviewText: Company came out and done a wonderful job installing my water heater! I was nervous because I know nothing about plumbing but they were very honest and gave the best pricing around! I will be using them for my plumbing needs for the rest of my life! Thanka guys! Would give 10 stars but it doesn't go that high!!!!

reviews.name: Davis Mask
reviews.reviewText:
Mr. Lawson was able to come out quick and fixed our issue with ease. Perfect man to call for fast, efficient plumbing work at a reasonable cost.
(Also his responses to 1 star comments are hilarious)

reviews.name: Nicholas
reviews.reviewText: I know who I?ll be contacting with any plumbing needs from now on. Jeremy was detailed, honest and thorough in his work and at a fair price. 10/10 recommend!!

reviews.name: Butch Neal
reviews.reviewText: I?ve used Lawson Plumbing twice and both times I got quick service, with everything fixed to my satisfaction.

reviews.name: Cheryl Palmer
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy came late in the evening and found why the sink and shower were backing up. A temporary solution was set up with plans to come back on Saturday. He was very knowledgeable and a pleasure to have service our home.

reviews.name: Allee Fradenburg
reviews.reviewText: We called JW Lawson Plumbing Tuesday evening and Jeremy came the next day to help with an outside water meter issue. He was able to identify it within a few minutes and fix the problem. He?s very knowledgeable and a Great Plumber!  We are so very happy he was able to help us so quickly and will definitely keep his number for all plumbing related issues going forward. Thank you Jeremy!!

reviews.name: Kevin Fowler
reviews.reviewText: Helped solve a problem with a gas leak over s weekend .  Prompt service and good results

reviews.name: Angela Tanner
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend this company. We had a massive water leak. Gentleman came quickly and fixed the problem. Excellent work, very professional, and courteous.

reviews.name: Portia Gaines
reviews.reviewText: I call him on a Monday. He came out on Tuesday. He fix my plumbing problem that day.. He did a great job. He is a excellent plumber. I would recommend him to everyone. He was so nice. Just  excellent customer service.

reviews.name: Kay
reviews.reviewText: Quick to respond when I called. Came out the same day and made the repairs needed. Will use his services again.

reviews.name: C Bartee
reviews.reviewText: Lawson Plumbing will be my go-to for any and all future plumbing needs. Jeremy came out on a Sunday morning, was very professional and courteous, charged a fair price, and did excellent work in a timely manner. Will use again.

reviews.name: Aida Assaad
reviews.reviewText: JW was quick to respond when I needed a plumber. His communication and timeliness was so helpful. We didn?t need him to come out after all but he?ll be top of our list going forward.

reviews.name: Ryan Childers
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend JW plumbing. Jeremy came and fixed what I screwed up and was professional and did a great job. He also fixed something that wasn?t done correctly when my house was built. Fair priced exceptional service.

reviews.name: Tomorrow Land
reviews.reviewText: Very professional, got to the house promptly and fixed all the issues I had, will continue to use his services in the future, highly recommended

reviews.name: Timothy Causey
reviews.reviewText: I called them up on a Sunday morning and told them I had a main line water leak. I was told that they would come out that evening and see what they could do. They were very prompt with the time and very knowledgeable, courteous about plumbing. They got right on the job and fixed it quickly. When I have another problem I will definitely be giving them a call!!!!

reviews.name: Caroline Clawson
reviews.reviewText: Jermey went above and beyond to fix our ice marker and even went the extra mile to fix our garbage disposal and other things around the house! I highly recommend!

reviews.name: Jordan Ashleigh
reviews.reviewText:
My dad  gave me this number when i told him about a leak I had under my house. Said he called them awhile back about work he needed done. Turned out to be something that would have to be dealt with by the city, but apparently one of these guys felt bad about not being able to address the underlying issue, so he decided to clean up and repair some of the damage that had been caused by it.  Took about an hour and he didn't charge a dime.

Cut to the chase, I am so glad I made this call because Jeremy was very timely in his response and in getting the job done. Very knowledgeable and professional with competitive pricing. Definitely our  go-to now for any future plumbing needs. Very highly recommend. 10 stars

reviews.name: Josh Bartlett
reviews.reviewText: We?ve called this Man countless times over the years from what seemed to him to be simple at times to the seriously down and dirty side of the business. He handled every job with absolute professionalism and respect for my wife, family and home were beyond exceptional. Five Stars isn?t enough and I don?t have a vast enough vocabulary to put into words how much I recommend and trust this company

reviews.name: JustinandErin Hammock
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy is a great guy. Called at 8:30 P.M. for a bad backup and he was here in 20 minutes. He stayed until 11 to make sure everything was fixed. Highly recommend Jeremy and will use him going forward for any plumbing needs

reviews.name: Carl Murray
reviews.reviewText: I reached out to Jeremy on a Sunday at 11:30am about a clogged kitchen sink, I was unable to plunge or snake myself effectively. He responded quickly and after a few questions over the next half hour or so, He arrived at ~2:15 pm. The issue and everything was done by 3:00 pm. He was very knowledgeable and helpful. I would recommend

reviews.name: Holly Brown
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time, fixed all problems that were pending. We  had to order a drain and he will come back to install. Professional work, very neat left nothing to be cleaned up!

reviews.name: Colby Brennan
reviews.reviewText: Thank you for your help! We had a very stressful plumbing issue that Jeremy was able to fix in a very efficient and timely manner. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.name: Savannah Newton
reviews.reviewText: Friendly, quick, and did a great job! He was very fast responding to our situation, and he did a great job explaining the problem and possible solutions. I would definitely call them with any emergency or non emergency plumbing needs!!

reviews.name: john baty
reviews.reviewText: J.W. LAWSON PLUMBING was the best.  I needed emergency service.  They were fast to arrive and did an outstanding job.  I would highly recommend.

reviews.name: Buddy Mack
reviews.reviewText: Quoted me a time and arrived promptly. Fixed some additional things in bathroom willingly. Gave me a short pep talk and also taught me something about plumbing if I were to become a homeowner. Great guy.

reviews.name: Destiny Torres
reviews.reviewText: Jim came out quickly and effectively cleared the clog in my bathroom sink! Would recommend using them again!

reviews.name: sarah herron
reviews.reviewText: We have used them a couple of times and they are always fantastic with the work they do, their quick response to issues and quick turn around!

reviews.name: Cindy King
reviews.reviewText: Went out of his way to come and fix a pipe that had damage from a freeze. Was very efficient and took the time and insulated it which wasn't even done before.  Would highly recommend.

reviews.name: Brian Loggins
reviews.reviewText: JW Lawson did a great job clearing my kitchen sink drain. I recommend Mr. Lawson to anybody that needs to get a plumbing problem fixed

reviews.name: kennedy
reviews.reviewText: J.W. Lawson Plumbing is just amazing!!! He is always dependable, always available, and overall a great help.10/10 always recommend.

reviews.name: Ken Pruitt
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy came out quickly to address a minor emergency.  His workmanship was very high quality & he cleaned the work area when he finished.  I highly recommend JW Lawson plumbing. I will call them for my next job.

reviews.name: D Lynne
reviews.reviewText: Second time we have used J.W. Lawson Plumbing. Another wonderful experience - Professional work, reasonable prices, great people.

reviews.name: Susan
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend this company!!! Service was great and speedy service to fix my water problem in my home!!!

reviews.name: Carol Wilson
reviews.reviewText: We have used JM twice good people to work with. Neither problem was serious, meaning not a big money project yet they came quickly as if they were going to make a lot. Good to know they are just a phone call away

reviews.name: Jeremy Lockhart
reviews.reviewText: They got back to me very quickly. Jim came out and not only did an excellent job but took the time out to answer all my questions. I highly recommend using them for your plumbing needs. Again, Jim was fantastic. My only negative is that I can only give 5 stars.

reviews.name: Georgeann Hester
reviews.reviewText: Very knowledgeable and professional! Charged a fair price for the work done.

reviews.name: Chris Thompson
reviews.reviewText: I called around lunch time and received same day service (unexpected and very appreciated). Price was very fair. My new plumbers.

reviews.name: Jonathan Taylor
reviews.reviewText: We have had multiple great experiences with J.W. Lawson Plumbing. Jeremy is highly competent, reliable, and honest. He has always gone the extra mile to not only sort out our plumbing problems, but also take the time to answer our complicated questions so we can avoid future problems. We strongly recommend J.W. Plumbing for any plumbing needs.

reviews.name: Ronald Hamilton
reviews.reviewText: Gentleman is johnny on the spot. Took care of me fast. You could not ask for a better plumber. And help me correct problems that I have created. That would have caused me problems in the future. Balls I wanna say is thank you thank you thank you.

reviews.name: Jason Vardaman
reviews.reviewText: Jlawson was great did a very good. job was on time and got the job done. Highly recommended. Thanks man.

reviews.name: Michael Boshell
reviews.reviewText: Came out at 8pm to take care of my issue. Even checked a few other things since we just moved in to make sure we were in good shape. Timely service,  great work and reasonable prices. Thanks!

reviews.name: James Hight
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy was very friendly and knowledgeable about plumbing. Contacted him in the morning and he was at the house that evening. Couldn?t ask for better service or response time. Thank you.

reviews.name: Matthew Christopher Pflederer
reviews.reviewText: Has helped me a lot over the years and always follows through. He has come after hours and on weekends to make sure job gets done.

reviews.name: Joe Pugh
reviews.reviewText: Second time I?ve used him definitely recommend!!

reviews.name: catherine brakefield
reviews.reviewText: Professional and  Timely service for plumbing problems.

reviews.name: Daniel Fazekas
reviews.reviewText: Repaired a water service line on a Sunday. Were professional and on time and charged appropriately for the work involved. Will definately use them again and recommend.

reviews.name: Jalessia Washington-Williams
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy was absolutely amazing and affordable. He is recommended 10/10 in our book. He works quickly gets to the problem and repairs it within the hour if he is available. Thank you for your great customer service Jeremy!

reviews.name: John Spanos
reviews.reviewText: I have called Mr. Lawson for two different emergencies and he has come to our rescue both times. He shows up when he says and goes above and beyond to solve the problem. This man fixed our septic tank issue at midnight, two days before Christmas, in the rain! That's more than I expected and i gladly paid the minor cost that he asked for doing the work. He is the only plumber I will call!

reviews.name: Omi May
reviews.reviewText: So very nice to find a plumber that isn't out to gouge you with ridiculous prices. Very affordable and very efficient. Would highly recommend!!

reviews.name: Stacy Miner
reviews.reviewText: Plumbing emergency and I texted late on a Sunday and he was here Monday morning.  Great work!!!

reviews.name: Kelly Pearson
reviews.reviewText: They were quick to respond to a leaky pipe even on a weekend! For quick, nice and professional

reviews.name: Donald Herald
reviews.reviewText: They came out on a Holiday short notice to fix a leaky pipe. Very nice and good work. I recommend them!

reviews.name: Dr. D
reviews.reviewText: Great person. Was on time and it was a great price!

reviews.name: shirley clowes
reviews.reviewText: I had a completely clogged drain im my bathtub. Jeremy arrived early, which was great,  as I had to go to work in a few hours after appointment time. This was my 3rd time using this company. Once again  I was extremely satisfied, within 15 min, drain was open and water running freely. Very professional,  reasonable prices, and very friendly. Highly recomend this company

reviews.name: Brian Staton
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy responded very quickly on a Sunday regarding a water pressure problem we were having. He came out the same day and checked it out and said he would be back on Monday or Tuesday to finish. He was back on Tuesday to finish the job.

reviews.name: Charley Johnson
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy is a great guy and a pleasure to deal with. He?s a consummate professional in everything he?s done for us. I couldn?t recommend him more highly. Does what he say when he says and does it well. If you need plumbing or pipe fitting you can stop looking, this is the guy.

reviews.name: EMILY LISLE
reviews.reviewText: Came out quickly to handle a water leak at my house. Excellent service.

reviews.name: Katrina Matthews
reviews.reviewText: We were having issues getting a new Dishwasher put in after having one for over 18 years.   My husband tried and tried and did his best.   He could not get it in and hooked up. I said babe just stop. I was in tears and found Jeremy and called him about what was going on late in the afternoon and cried on the phone with him. I had had enough.   He was at my home around 6 that same day.  I did not expect that.  He had to redo the plumbing for the dishwasher as it was all wrong and had to take out the wood floor there to get the new one to fit.  The newer dishwashers are way different then the old ones.   It was so a relief having this young man come to our aide.   I will call him for future plumbing issues and will recommend him to others as well.   Thank you for being "Jeremy on the spot forget about Johnny on the spot you are Jeremy on the spot.  God Bless you and keep you.  Thomas and Katrina  Hayden, Alabama.

reviews.name: Kerry Shipp
reviews.reviewText: J. W. Lawson was actually my third call. The first 2 on a Google search, one, I left a message and never got a return call. The 2nd number was disconnected. Jeremy answered promptly. I let him know I was calling for my 85 yr old Mom and I was 100 miles away. Her kitchen sink was stopped up. Jeremy let me know he didn't have his schedule set for the day but would call my Mom and text me when he was heading to my Mom's house. I received a text at 11:36am and an hour later problem was taken care of. It's nice to know that someone with integrity is there to help in time of need. If another plumbing problem arises, I will certainly call J.W. Lawson Plumbing again.

reviews.name: AJ Kinney
reviews.reviewText:
I called on Friday afternoon due to not wanting to drain out of the washer. My husband checked the piping downstairs and discovered that one joint had come completely unsealed and was also leaking into the basement. Jeremy said he would be here the next morning. Not only was he on time, he was actually a bit early. He immediately got to work. He thought initially the septic tank might need pumped, however, on further inspection,  the pipe in the basement had come loose from what was holding it up properly and was now sitting at a downward angle. It wasn't allowing everything to pass through and thus there was a huge clog. Jeremy soon had everything cleaned out, that section of pipe replaced and resealed, and mounted back to the wall properly. He was extremely professional, courteous and I will most definitely call him again should I need anything in the future.
Thank you Jeremy!

reviews.name: Kathy Miller
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy responded very quickly to my emergency blown pipe problem caused by another plumber that wouldn't answer the phone on Saturday.  He kept me updated on when he would arrive and him and his crew are very professional.  Great to work with and would highly  recommend them. I will definitely use him again!!

reviews.name: Tristan Keith
reviews.reviewText: Great guy, preformed fast and professional service. Did everything to help us. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.name: Shea Clark
reviews.reviewText: Mr. Lawson came and unclogged a drain in my bathroom. He was very professional and fixed it fast. I highly recommend this company!!!

reviews.name: CourtneyGrill
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy was very friendly and professional. He made quick work and got us all fixed up.

reviews.name: Adrienne Walker
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy responded within hours of contacting him and was able to schedule a visit for the next day. Quickly determined the problem and repaired. Very knowledgeable. Friendly and professional.

reviews.name: Wesley Wood
reviews.reviewText: Came out on short notice on the weekend. Good professional service. Will use again. Highly recommend.

reviews.name: Christine Lowery
reviews.reviewText: Great install job, on time, cleaned up all mess and friendly.

reviews.name: Brad Ward
reviews.reviewText: Not only fixed my problem but showed what was wrong and what caused it. Resonable price. Highly reccomended.

reviews.name: SHERRY GLASS
reviews.reviewText: The man to call

reviews.name: Tiffiney Tracy
reviews.reviewText: He was very professional and he got here as soon as possible and got our toilets unclogged . Both of my toilets was clogged and he got them both unclogged in less than 30 minutes. He was very nice and his prices are great . We will be calling him again if my toilets get clogged anymore or we need a plumber .

reviews.name: Karin Thomas
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy was very punctual, professional and friendly. He came within 45 minutes of my call and he also came at a time when we received a bid from a company for a different repair. He saw that company was giving us a bid for repairs that we did not need and saved us thousands of dollars. He and his employees did a great job and cleaned up behind themselves.

reviews.name: S. Sheelor
reviews.reviewText: I had a situation happen at my home on a SATURDAY of all days! As much as I hate to bother anyone on the weekends; We had an emergency situation and while searching the internet to find someone to help us ASAP! Jeremy was quick to respond, more than willing to come out to our home on a Saturday and had one of his guys willing to take on the job in less than 20 minutes! I highly recommend this company without a doubt!!

reviews.name: Jacob Byers
reviews.reviewText: JW was excellent. We originally had tried to use Roto-Rooter for our job. They didn?t show up during their 2 hour time frame, then when we called them they said they were running late and weren?t sure what time they would make it. So we canceled and went with someone local. JW was a great communicator and showed up precisely on time. He quickly solved the problem and resolved it efficiently for a fair price.

reviews.name: Candice Williams
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy and his team were great! I called and they came out the same day and took care of my problem quickly and efficiently. They cleaned up everything and didn't leave any messes, made sure I was happy with the outcome and for a good price. Highly recommend and would use again in the future!

reviews.name: Leslie
reviews.reviewText: GREAT Service!  Called on a Saturday and he got right out and fixed our problem!  Also made recommendations to upgrades we want to do in the future. Cannot recommend him enough! A+++++++++++

reviews.name: stephen poole
reviews.reviewText: Fast, fixed our toilet and gave us a very fair price on a weekend. We'll be using them again in the future. Honest, fair and good. Cain't beat it. ??

reviews.name: Graham Davis
reviews.reviewText: These people were on time, polite and very tidy with their work area. I would highly recommend this company.

reviews.name: Birmingham bumble bee
reviews.reviewText: installed a basin for bathroom and unclogged main pipe of other bathroom. The original estimate was not needed since they fixed it without going into the walk so great deal!!!!! Jimbo and James very professional with estimate, on time arriving and fixing the problem quicker and less expensive than I thought.  Will for sure use them again with my plumbing problems. Matthew Wheeler

reviews.name: Rhonda A
reviews.reviewText:
My husband and I had a water pipe burst in our yard.
After calling another plumber and getting put on hold for a very long time , we hung up and called Mr Lawson , who came to our house in twenty minutes.It was around 7:30 PM on a Saturday when he arrived.We were afraid it was too late and would have to wait until Monday .
He not only fixed the pipe but answered all our questions and really showed he cared .
He was professional and very reasonable on
his price . He is definitely our new plumber.

reviews.name: Tyler Smith
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy and his team do great work. Quick to respond, fair quote, did excellent work and went above and beyond to make sure the job was done right. Also, work very clean and don?t leave a mess after the project is complete. Would highlight recommend!

reviews.name: Angie Carter
reviews.reviewText: Kitchen sink and dishwasher were completely backed up. Came out the same day I called and fixed it. Looked at a bathroom sink that was very slow to drain. Ended up having to rework a pipe (old pipes) but now the sink drains properly for the first time!  Will be my go to call for plumbing! Professional, and fair price.

reviews.name: Mitchell Tankersley
reviews.reviewText: Worked us into an already full Saturday and quickly solved our problem at a fair price.

reviews.name: Theresa Moody
reviews.reviewText: I'll be calling him for all my plumbing needs!!!! Excellent service!

reviews.name: Leigh Tumlin
reviews.reviewText: Great service combined with professionalism; helped me save on not only water bill but electric too! Was so well informed about the ins and outs of this house and was gracious to share his knowledge and expertise! I highly recommend Jeremy and his company!

reviews.name: Regina W
reviews.reviewText: Called on a Friday evening and he not only answered the phone but he came out and fixed it!! Amazing service!! Amazing price!! Very professional, very nice! Cannot say enough good things about them!! If you're looking for a good plumber, you've found one!!!

reviews.name: Christine Parker
reviews.reviewText:
Jeremy is a super nice guy. He was informative and helpful while repairing our kitchen faucet... he explained the problem thoroughly and told us how to repair should it happen again.

While doing the repair he noticed that my dishwasher was unlevel and a little wompy...so he fixed that too. He ended up having to cut into the cabinets to get everything to fit proper and brought up his shop vac to clean up. Cleaned under all my major appliances while he was at it. I later made a comment to watch his step on a flight of stairs because my light was out and he offered to fix that too.

Jeremy is the most diligent repair man I've met. He cuts no corners and really goes above and beyond. Highly recommend.

reviews.name: Misty Gardner
reviews.reviewText: Jeremy was on time and had the problem fixed in a short time. He was professional and friendly and I would recommend him and his business.

reviews.name: John Amason
reviews.reviewText: Busted the outside faucet with my mower at my house. Called a few places and was told it would be a day or so until someone could come out. Called jwlawson and he came right over. Hard getting anything done on a Sunday but he got here quick. Great guy. Very professional and did a fantastic job with a very good price. Definitely call again when needed and will refer.

reviews.name: Frank Doganiero
reviews.reviewText: Quick response, great customer service & very professional!

reviews.name: Jennifer Skipper
reviews.reviewText: Amazing service! He did a great job of fixing the leak we had in the upstairs bathroom. The job required sheet rock repair work. I was out of town and he took care of getting someone he knew to repair it. When I got back in town all the work was done to perfection. I will definitely use him again and highly recommend him!

reviews.name: Yolanda Hogeland
reviews.reviewText: Very responsive, professional, and on time.  I will definitely call him again.  I highly recommend him.

reviews.name: Emma Rose Courington
reviews.reviewText: Very grateful. We have had our bathroom tub worked on 2 or 3 times before (by another plumber)  and the same issues kept coming up again. This time I can tell that the problem was resolved all the way to the root issue and our tub is working better than ever. He was persistent in making sure the issue was actually resolved once and for all.

reviews.name: Brett Alexander
reviews.reviewText: Had a problem Saturday night called them and he helped over the phone to get through the night next morning they were there fixed problem quick and very reasonable on price!Great people great buisness

reviews.name: A Smith
reviews.reviewText: Excellent plumbing service: professional, neat quality work, very dependable and great value! Thank you Jeremy!

reviews.name: Cathrine Dean
reviews.reviewText: Came quickly when he heard we needed help.

reviews.name: Cindy Walker
reviews.reviewText: They were very responsive, reliable, and did a great job.  They came the same day I called.  I will definitely call them again.

reviews.name: Daniel Garcia
reviews.reviewText: great customer service. great price. very professional. highly recommend

reviews.name: Maria Burke
reviews.reviewText: This company got here on time and were able to get the water heater installed very quickly. They were so professional and did such great work. They will be my go to plumber from now on!  I wish I had this contact earlier...

reviews.name: wvalbeth

reviews.reviewText: This is the 7th (or maybe 8th) time I've used Muddy Buddy's Plumbing. I've had them install several water heaters in my house and rental units, plumb a shower for a bathroom remodel, reroute a sink drain and vent for a kitchen remodel, and fix several other plumbing issues. Buddy and his crew do a great job at a reasonable price. They are courteous, professional, and keep you informed of the project's progress. I have tried other local plumbers in the past, but I learned my lesson quickly. Muddy Buddy's Plumbing is the only plumber's number I have stored in my phone, and the only plumber I will use from now on. I can't recommend Muddy Buddy enough.

reviews.reviewText: We had a water leak and needed a trustworthy, reliable plumber. A friend recommended Buddy so I gave him a call. He was very nice, down to earth and personable. He showed up on time exactly when scheduled. After explaining our situation to him and talking for a few minutes, he explained what was needed, made recommendations and gave me a price. Very reasonable rate so he and the young man he had with him, Landon, made the repair immediately. It?s so hard nowadays to find people and companies you can trust who are reliable, trustworthy and honest, but this was a great experience and did not disappoint. We highly recommend Muddy Buddy?s and will call them in the future for our plumbing needs!

We?re new in the area and didn?t know who to call so we reached out again to the Muddy Buddy crew. At first, Glenda patiently walked me through via phone in finding a solution, but when that didn?t work, Guy dropped his morning plans to help solve our lawn irrigation problem (even though this was not a standard plumbing service). These awesome folks didn?t have to respond on a Sunday morning, but they did and I?m just continually amazed by the people we?ve interacted with here in Huntsville AL, most especially Guy and Glenda for their above and beyond sincerity, and customer care. I know this might be saying much, but these are truly good folks and I have no hesitation referring family and friends to them. Thank you once again guys, proud to say we?re your new lifelong customers?and friends!!

And my plumber/technician, Landon Brown, was just wonderful.
Sharp, professional, and technically brilliant.
He squared away my kitchen sink plumbing issues promptly, and now everything is ship-shape and Bristol fashion.
Thank you so much!!

reviews.reviewText: Absolutely the best service I have gotten from a plumber. They came out to clear a pipe that another company failed to clean. The pipe was busted under the concrete so Muddy Buddy had to reroute the pipe to another location. A different company came out before and obviously damaged the pipe while trying to get it to drain, and then they did an estimate to reroute the pipes just in case it needed it. Obviously, it needed it after the pipe wall was busted at the first turn. Their price climbed to over $2k in less than 10 minutes by adding in other pipes and parts that had to be replaced (but didnt need to be replaced). Muddy Buddy did the job that needed to be done without replacing good pipes in a few hours that the other company said would take a week, and Muddy Buddy did the job for 1/3 of the price of the other company's estimate and didnt add in other pipes, parts, and days of labor just to make a buck. Good old fashioned service without trying to rip off their customers.

reviews.reviewText: We had our house supply line replaced, and K-Wood did a great job for a better price than other estimates we received. Went the extra mile to make sure the connection inside our house was clean and would last.

reviews.name: Daniel Lowe
reviews.reviewText: Have used K-Wood Plumbing many times and they have always come through. Great guy, always responsive and has helped me in a pinch several times. Will always be my first call.

reviews.name: Patrick Grant
reviews.reviewText: We had a leaking gas water heater. I called K-Wood about 2:00 this afternoon, and the water heater that I picked up today was installed by 4:30. Fast and professional service at less than half the price the larger plumbing companies wanted. They even hauled away my old heater.

reviews.name: Mark Higgins
reviews.reviewText: 5 stars has never let us down at our complex. Wheather it is big or small.

reviews.name: D Burke
reviews.reviewText: K-Wood was excellent. They responded timely, did a great job, were very nice and very reasonably priced! Will definitely use again!

reviews.name: Steve Jones
reviews.reviewText: Called to get a damaged shower repaired. Told him about the problem and he was able to give me a non binding guesstimate over the phone. I ask you who is willing to do that. Showed up the next day on time. Accessed the problem and he needed to do a little more than either of us anticipated, a whole $76 so no big deal. He and his helper were courteous, professional and fast. Job well done! We will defiantly use them again.

reviews.name: Kelsie Sapp
reviews.reviewText: Kelli and his team were so professional and did a great job! They showed up early, installed our water heater, and Kelli even unclogged the drain in our tub for no charge though they weren't there for that. Our water heater is working great and we'll be using them for our other plumbing needs!

reviews.name: mike pfaff
reviews.reviewText: Did a great job. Responsible price.

reviews.name: Tyler Croft
reviews.reviewText: I HIGHLY recommend Cochran brothers plumbing and gas! I called Blake at 7pm and he was at my house within 30 minutes.. Our lines were clogged and he had it unclogged in a very short time! He is very skilled and professional in his work and is very reasonable in his pricing! Thank you blake for such quick and excellent work! I will recommend you to everyone I know!

reviews.name: Gail Shields
reviews.reviewText: The Cochran Brothers accomplished a task that others had deemed impossible. My mother had long desired a gas stove, and today, the Cochran Brothers made her dream a reality. Their exceptional professionalism and honesty have undoubtedly earned them more customers. I highly recommend their services. They responded promptly to my inquiry, demonstrating their reliability. I am grateful to Steven Butler for the recommendation.

reviews.name: Kaleigh Pledger
reviews.reviewText:
Had a great experience with Blake Cochran when I needed a rusted out, leaky pipe repaired/replaced!

Quick response to my inquiries, easy to communicate with, honest and open about the prices and the process, and showed up fast to fix the issue! Thanks so much for the good work, Blake!

reviews.name: Brandon Bynum
reviews.reviewText: Amazing experience! Blake was out here quickly! Communicated the entire time ! Was the best plumber experience we have ever had. Very nice guy, extremely kind and respectful.  10/10 highly recommend. ?

reviews.name: Mary Iris Ellis
reviews.reviewText:
If you need a plumber, I HIGHLY recommend Blake Cochran from Cochran Brothers Plumbing and Gas LLC.
I called him last week about a shower valve leak, and he came by within hours to come check it out and gave me a FREE estimate. Blake showed me the possible causes of the leak, and then provided me with different options for the repair. He gave me a reasonable price, so we scheduled the job. He arrived ON TIME and was ready to get to work thinking the whole faucet would need to be replaced and the tile would need to be cut out. Once he started the job, he was HONEST and explained that some simple parts were all that were needed to repair the leak which LOWERED the cost significantly. He is organized, and the invoice was easy to pay right then by credit card with an instant digital receipt for my records.

reviews.name: Barbara Rothschild
reviews.reviewText: Amazing service and repair. Would highly, highly  recommend the Cochran Brothers for any plumbing needs/repairs!

reviews.name: Jennifer Greene
reviews.reviewText: Great service! Will definitely use again!

reviews.name: Peggy Fields
reviews.reviewText:
My elderly mom lives in Gadsden and a water leak had dripped downstairs into her den. She did not know what was wrong. I tried to find someone who could come soon to find the leak and fix it. Many plumbers do not return calls or are booked out for days. Jonathan at Machen did return my call and said to call Cochran Brothers. I am so glad I did! He came out the very next morning at 8:30 and said it was the toilet tank upstairs. He replaced the toilet that same morning. We will always use Cochran for our plumbing problems.
Another handyman had looked upstairs and wanted to tear out the tile wall. I am so glad we didn't do that! It's best to call a licensed plumber and I recommend Cochran Brothers.

reviews.name: Stephanie K
reviews.reviewText: I cannot say enough about Veterans plumbing. We were a victim of these crazy freezing temps and our laundry room pipe busted late Christmas afternoon. I called several plumbers and someone recommended Nick with Veterans. I called him and he answered on Christmas Day and said he could send someone out the next day. Every other plumber was Tuesday or Wednesday the earliest. They showed up early too and the value compared to what I have paid before was unbeatable. I had to ask Nick if the price was correct before I paid, as it was the best price I have seen in sometime. I am so glad I received this recommendation and they will definitely be my new plumbers of choice going forward!

reviews.name: Camille Pernell
reviews.reviewText: We had our main water line leaking. Nick did an amazing job replacing the line and then helped us with extensive piping issue in our basement. Quality work, honest company. Highly recommend.

reviews.name: Treina Mcculloch
reviews.reviewText: I received same day service.  They showed up on time.  Discussed issues with me before doing repair.  Cost was reasonable.  Very courteous.  Veterans is my plumber of choice.

reviews.name: Davis Nelson
reviews.reviewText: Outstanding service. Arrived on time and did the job in very quick and professional way. I would highly recommend this company to anyone.

reviews.name: Carol Floyd
reviews.reviewText: Nick was very polite and professional and did the work in a timely manner.

reviews.name: Leigh Anne Miller
reviews.reviewText: Very personable  and professional.He took about an hour and a half to identify 5 leaks in my water line and  fix them plus covered back up the trench.

reviews.name: Susan Hendrix
reviews.reviewText: Very polite and professional! I have used this young man several times. He knows his plumbing. You won?t be disappointed!

reviews.name: Tania Hansen
reviews.reviewText: Great work! Respectful, and easy to work with.

reviews.name: Veronica Mccollum
reviews.reviewText: Very responsive and helpful. Would use their service again and highly recommend them!

reviews.name: Greg King
reviews.reviewText: We were building a garage apartment that had no plumbing or water to the structure. After several quotes, we decided to go with veteran plumbing. Nick was great to work with and very professional. The quality of work was top notch. I had concerns over locating and running water to the apartment, but Nick very professionally located the water line and was able to determine the best options to correctly run the water line to the new structire. I am very pleased with the service and finished product that Nick provided. I would highly recommend him and he will be my first call when I need future work. Great experience

reviews.name: David Barber
reviews.reviewText: Nick is a professional in all definitions of the word professional. We have used him on multiple occasions for different plumbing needs.  A true Veteran and brother in arms who stands by his country and his work 110%.

reviews.name: Alan Billingsley
reviews.reviewText: Nick had been great working with us. Quality work, he has done work for us and our children with on time service  and competitive prices. What impresses me most is he uses top notch materials and has always let us know what he wants to do and it has always been in our best interest. We have postponed work to make sure we use him instead of others. Highly recommend, if you have an opportunity use Nick/ Veterans Plumbing LLC

reviews.name: Garry Clark
reviews.reviewText: Nick replaced a faulty hot water heater and PRV on short notice. His work ethic and expertise was impressive and commendable.  I typically value quality of work over price, but with Nick, you get both. I will call on his skills again and highly recommend his services.

reviews.name: Marble House Coffee
reviews.reviewText: Veteran Plumbing installed all the plumbing for my brand new coffee house in Acworth. It was a huge job. Nick is incredibly responsive, has extremely competitive pricing (I priced 3 different companies), and does wonderful, clean work. My job had to be inspected by the county, and they never had any issues with Nick's work. He is also enjoyable to be around, which is a bonus! Save yourself some time and call Nick for your job. You'll be glad you did!

reviews.name: hans ellison
reviews.reviewText: Nick did a great job on our kitchen ceiling leak. There were three holes that needed to be repaired, and another pipe that was questionable. He replaced all 3 pipes, plus the 4th for no additional charge.  Very professional and uses the best equipment for the job. 4 patches done in under an hour.

reviews.name: Marc Rusterucci
reviews.reviewText: Nick and The Veteran Plumbling LLC Team are true life savers. Each time we call, there is no job too big and there is no job too small. No matter the time of day, they are there to answer the call and provide complimentary diagnostics by phone. There is no greater value than Free Advice. And, there is no greater company than Veteran Plumbing LLC.

reviews.name: Nicole Hall
reviews.reviewText: Fabulous job Nick!  I had some serious plumbing issues in my home (prior plumbing from a different plumber that was installed incorrectly).  Nick was able to get it all fixed quickly and CORRECTLY!  Very professional and knowledgeable!  Thank you!!!

reviews.name: Perry Kinney
reviews.reviewText:
You couldn't ask for a more honest and fair plummer. Nick came when he said he would and fixed my water leak. I highly recommend him as he makes sure the job is done correctly and offered no surprises when it came to his bill.
You won't be sorry. Just give him a call..

reviews.name: Jerry Ellis
reviews.reviewText: Very professional, fast, honest, friendly.

reviews.reviewText: Absolutely the best and most professional plumber.  He worked us in right away.  Quick, efficient and friendly.  Thanks Dan.

reviews.name: Brian Henry

PlumberDan is the BEST!

reviews.name: Paige Sims
reviews.reviewText: We use Plumber Dan for all of our plumbing needs. They are always professional and extremely nice. They offer great work at an extremely fair price. The work we have had done is second to none. You can?t go wrong with Plumber Dan!

reviews.reviewText: Very friendly, responsive, and knowledgeable. Most importantly, very honest. Plumber Dan?s attention to detail sets him apart from any other plumber we?ve used. There is no other plumber I would consider using. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewText: I can't thank the PlumberDan crew, especially the gentleman that came and replaced out water heater. He was polite, professional, and attentive to our issue. PlumberDan is the way to go when you have plumbing need. 10stars from us!

reviews.reviewText: Todd Brown was a great plumber, he came out quickly on a weekend to check out our sewage pump. He was able to replace the pump, again for a very competitive price. I spoke with 3 other plumbers and was quoted $3-5k, but Todd did it for significantly less. Once the job was complete, he showed me that everything was functioning and was on his way. Definitely recommend and he'll be the first I'll call in the future.

reviews.reviewText: Browns plumbing showed up on time and fixed our problems! He was very nice and explained what needed to be done. Very professional and clean. The price he gave me was very good for the amount of work we needed. I will use him for all our plumbing needs.

reviews.name: Carolyn ?WhoDatRN!? Laskowski
reviews.reviewText: Plumbing Genius!

reviews.reviewText: Had a a broken pipe and no water at 10pm. My wife gets to shower in the a.m. and all is well thanks to Brown's Plumbing Solutions. Very professional, friendly, and a great price. Thanks for helping me out!!!

Professsional demeanor and clean professional work.

reviews.reviewText: I'm a huge fan of Byers Plumbing.  They've done both large and small plumbing jobs at my house and have been easy to contact, quick to respond, and really professional with their quality work.  Be sure to text them if unable to connect via voice.  Only plumbers I use.

Anthony showed up around 915, took a quick look at things and got to work digging where the leak was springing from. After about 2.5 hours he was all done. Great customer service, clearly explained the issue and solution and quickly made the repair. Thankful for companies like Delta! Thanks again Anthony.

reviews.name: J. Jackson
reviews.reviewText:
What an awesome experience. In the process of selling my father's home and didn't know it had a septic tank as opposed to a public sewer system. I was told that any plumbing service could inspect and provide the clearance letter needed for selling the home. Thanks to my realtor for doing the leg work and calling different plumbing companies, he gave me Delta's number, and because I had used them in the past I felt comfortable scheduling the inspection for my father's home.

Calling and speaking with Ms. Opal to set up the appointment went without a hitch as she was so very courteous and took the time to answer my questions and was very detailed in the information that she needed as well as the work that would be performed. She even sent a follow up email to let me know that she received my signed authorization form that I emailed back to her....I didn't even have to call and ask....WOW.

The pleasant experience didn't stop there, Mr. Trace called me once he arrived to the property and then called me back to let me know the results of the inspection. Because I was out of town taking care of my mother, Mr. Trace could have told me anything, but yet he was honest to confirm that the tank was in very good condition and didn't need any service.

Thank you to both Ms. Opal and Mr. Trace for your awesome customer service, your attention to detail, and keeping the customer top of mind!! Awesome!

reviews.reviewText: Very courteous and knowledgeable when explaining the issues and resolves where possible. Thank you Jerry

reviews.reviewText: Anthony was a pleasure to work with. Very informative and took the time to diagnose and determine the best path forward. Would hire again, no issues!
