reviews.reviewText: Ivan was incredible!  What looked like it should be an easy task ended up being alot more complicated.  After attempting a variety of options, he settled on the best one to achieve my request.  He was fantastic.  I highly recommend Ivan.  If I need anything in the future, I will request Ivan.  Thank you Ivan!

reviews.name: Pat Mills
reviews.reviewText: AWESOME AWESOME........ Jacob & Delta Plumbing are 5 star plus in my book.   We had a serious plumbing and called Delta and they were here very quickly since it was an emergency and we didn't want out brand new floor and bathroom ruined because of the back up that was caused from 64 year old cast iorn pipes rusting and breaking apart.    They were here 2 days assessing the job, was here early in the day Wednesday and started the job.  Every piece of dirt was put back into place.....lol .......and the made special care of not tearing up a new baby tree that had just been planted recently.  They doubled checked the water to make sure it was running threw the new pipes properly, had me run water threw the washing machine several times so that everything was flowing correctly and not backing up again.  The speediness and care they gave me was top notch.  Everything they had to do or needed to do they told me first and asked if i wanted to do it and yes we did it.  And I couldn't be happier.  In the past we have used several different plumbers but no one has ever taken the time to explain everything to us and give us the option as to what we wanted to do, and give me the respect I deserve being that its our house and our money.  No pressure or pushing us into a decision we needed to think about it and go over with him on.   I totally recommend Delta Plumbing for any and all plumbing problems they would be the one's I'd call and "will" call.  Thank you Jacob for your help, your kindness and concern of what could have happened in the very near future had we not had all those pipes replaced.  Thank you Delta

reviews.reviewText:
I'm reviewing the plumbing service I received from Mike's Plumbing and Electric.  They were dispatched via my home warranty company.  They responded quickly to my issue, showed up on time, and called me when they were enroute.  The technician was polite, courteous, and took the time to let me walk him through the issue we were having with our bathtub.  He fixed the problem promptly and even gave me a few pointers to help me prevent similar issues in the future.

I've seen a few bad reviews from people based on their "home warranty" and their repair not being covered.  Whether you dispatch a plumber, electrician, or AC specialist, they can only cover items that your home warranty company lets them cover, based on your contract (that you picked).  People should read their contracts first before taking their frustrations out on a local business.  Cheaper home warranties cover less items, go figure.

This was the one big aggravating factor. Other than that, there's only a few more things I'd suggest. Buy Booties that you can pull over your shoes. Very professional and knowledgeable of his business.
I would highly recommend him and will use him in the future if needed.

After a full day's schedule Mr. Payton and crew showed up at 7:00 pm pumped and inspected my system.
Payton's have my business from here on out.

First off, my wife and I had the total nightmare of our septic system suddenly failing and we were not able to take a shower, flush the toilet, do laundry, or dishes.  Furthermore, we had no idea where our septic tank was.

They were able to find the septic tank, which is somehow partially under our AC unit and our deck (Look, we didn't build this house, okay?) which felt like waking up from a nightmare only to wake up and find out it's much worse than that.

But these guys were able to so skillfully, and delicately move around their obstacles with no damage to anything, and get our septic tank fixed. I am beyond impressed and so very thankful!

reviews.name: JDR (EntoMan)
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely phenomenal service. I called, got a fair price, and less than 3 hours later, my septic was cleaned out and everything was flowing again. Can't beat that! The two techs that came out were very professional, knowledgeable, and friendly. Couple of genuinely good guys. They didn't mind me watching (it was legit cool to watch), and asking questions, always taking the time to answer any questions and give me solid advice on taking care of the septic system. They were able to raise and lower the concrete septic lid with a feather touch using the backhoe (impressive!) and cleaned everything up nicely. And the price I was quoted on the phone was exactly what I paid, not a penny more. I had always heard horror stories about septic service and dreaded the day, but with the excellent price and awesome service, Ikard Septic made it a breeze. Call these guys first when you need septic service. I highly recommend them!!

His crew was professional, respectful, knowledgeable, and fast. Richie came the same day the leak and damage was found and kept me informed throughout the whole process. He went above and beyond to make sure that my home was properly restored. I love my new kitchen and bathroom! I highly recommend Richards Restoration.

reviews.reviewText: Fantastic job working with my insurance to fix our bathroom after a leak!

reviews.name: Kristin Countryman
reviews.reviewText: This is the best team for all your restoration needs!  Our entire home flooded from a busted pipe upstairs. reviews.name: Orin Battles
reviews.reviewText: Richard's restoration came in at a timely rate, assessed the situation and mitigated my issue within hours of me calling . They handle everything for you even down to the phone calls. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewText: Richard Restoration helped our church (Safe Harbor Church of God in Rainbow City) in a very timely manner when a pipe froze and burst on Christmas of 2022. Besides remediation, they painted walls, repaired sheet rock, and installed flooring. Everything was done with excellence. They even helped us when dealing with the insurance adjuster. We highly recommend Richard Restoration.

reviews.name: Kim moss
reviews.reviewText: Richard Restoration responded quickly to my house when i had a leak and it flooded.  They took care of the problem and remodeled my house. I couldn?t be happier with the outcome.  I appreciate them!   They did such a good job.  Thanks, Richard Restoration! I?m one happy customer and highly recommend them for any of your restoration needs

reviews.name: LeAnne Segers
reviews.reviewText: We have had two leaks in our home and Covenant has helped with both. They are easy and wonderful to work with, very professional and good quality. We would recommend them to others and we are grateful for all they have done.

reviews.name: Mark Harrelson
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommended....came to my rescue on a weekend. Courteous, efficient service with lots of follow up.

reviews.name: Susan Raymond
reviews.reviewText: They came promptly on a Saturday to begin the drying up process after my leak.  They did great work and my house looks great after a lot of restoration.  Everyone who came here to work was professional and friendly.

reviews.name: Joan Oinos
reviews.reviewText:
Excellent!  I can't say enough about the great service we received from the Covenant team!  From the initial help drying out our damp house (from the pipe leaking) to the repair of drywall and  ceiling to painting the damaged areas - they took care of us!!!!
Melissa was wonderful!  She worked with our insurance claims people and, more importantly, she worked with me!!!  David and his team were amazing - took care of the repair and cosmetic work that needed to be done very efficiently and promptly!!!  THANK YOU Covenant!!!!  You are all so appreciated!!!

reviews.name: Emily Dickinson
reviews.reviewText: Had a pipe burst under my house and they came out immediately to start removing  the water even though it was late in the evening.  Everyone associated was friendly and helpful in answering any questions I had. They also coordinated payment with my insurance company.

reviews.name: Glenda Boudreaux
reviews.reviewText: We were so worried when our kitchen floors started buckling! After calling a plumber and AC company the plumber recommend we call covenant.  They came right in and began investigating.  They determined the problem which was condensation from under a porch.   I highly recommend them if you have water issues

reviews.name: Sid Tait
reviews.reviewText:
I have had some dealings with Covenant Contracting beforeaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaabut this time it is a major job. I called on them because I liked their way of doing business in the little things. Now I have a major repair job and they took it right on, came out looked at everything, explained to me what needed to be done and what they would do to fix it and bring the whole room up to standards again. First the crew with the dryers set up, this was a major amount of water damage and the dryers stayed in place four days. Then the adjustor came, went over everything in the room, made his notes and took his measurements, was on Time for his appointment, very polite, very efficient, very friendly and explained all that needed to be done. He left and a week later I had my estimate, knew exactly how much I needed to be prepared to pay, I was instructed to pick put the flooring I want to use as a replacement for the damaged tiles. I picked that out and sent it to the office, If it is the kind of floor they wil work with and can use, then we are ready to roll on my repair. The entire company is so good, from the front desk personnel to every workman who has come here to do anything. I am so impressed at the work ethic of these folks, and am so pleased with everything about this company. I want to recommend them to anyone who needs work one, and I will highly recommend them to anyone I know who may need their services. Thank you to everyone there, THANK YOU SO MUCH!
Sie Tait
Riverside. AL

reviews.name: Crystal Mahan
reviews.reviewText: This was my first time having a "home issue" Melissa has been on point, and always available to answer my questions. I love the crew that came out and it was actually Josh Acosta- who found where my water was leaking from. He was VERY knowledgeable and gave me step by step the process so I would feel comfortable. I highly recommend them!!

reviews.name: Kimberly Sales
reviews.reviewText: We recently had the opportunity to work with this company, our situation was water damage, there were a few bumps along the way and the process was timely, but the office staff is nice and every issue was handled with great professionalism. I would definitely recommend this company. Thanks to Covenant Contracting!

reviews.name: Richard Sims
reviews.reviewText: Josh & Johnathan were just excellent: They kept us abreast of what they were doing & followed up daily. We were very impressed with the work & would recommend Covenant to friends & family.

reviews.name: Ruby Felton
reviews.reviewText: Covenant came in to repair damage that another company had caused and did an excellent job. Covenant?s employee arrived on time, cleaned up after himself, didn?t prolong the job. I would use them again.

reviews.name: Linda McCoy
reviews.reviewText: This contractor did a very good job for me.   They did an excellent job of water mitigation and came back to repair and replace drywall and vinyl flooring.  The cost was reasonable.

reviews.name: Kyle Davis
reviews.reviewText: Called Covenant to deal with  water leak damage.  Called at 7:00 A.M. on a Saturday morning and they were at my house by 9:00 A.M. working on  drying the carpet and containing any mold.  Their team did entire clean up and renovation and did a great job! Would definitely recommend.

reviews.name: Keona Massie
reviews.reviewText: Prior to meeting the representatives at Covenant, I was going through an unfavorable situation. The contractors that came to my house were extremely understanding. Every one of them have been nice and professional. They definitely have provided amazing customer service.

reviews.name: Carroll Thorn
reviews.reviewText: Their cleanup process was thorough, the water removal went well, they were at my home the day they received the call about the flooding.   Kudos to Melissa who put up with all my questions, Josh and his brother for being such great guys to work with.  This is a fantastic group who do an excellent job.

reviews.name: Ernest Grant
reviews.reviewText: In time of need, you can do no better than Covenant.  With a water leak between walls causing wood damage and mold, plus the leak's moisture destroying portions of the surrounding walls in two rooms, Covenant quickly arrived, evaluated the problems, and on that day repaired the pesky leak.  The very next day Covenant returned and began eliminating the mold problem.  Having been asked by me, they even subcontracted out to repair the walls.  I expected the cost of repairs to be exorbitant, but to my surprise the prices were very reasonable.  The staff were professional, informative, and because I have little experience in these matters they took the lead working with my insurance company and the property's tenant to ensure any bumps were mitigated.  With each step they emails confirmation of the step's beginning and it's completion.  When they finalized the job, the occupying tenant informed me Covenant worked within their schedule, and the work done left them completely satisfied and confident of the repairs.  Would I use them again?  Well, with service like this, where I can confidently leave everything up to the professionals?  Yes. I'd use them again - always.  Thanks for the assist Covenant.

reviews.name: Alan Ryals
reviews.reviewText: Covenant did an excellent job of clearing all damage material and drying out the water after we had a pipe burst during the last cold snap. They also removed all of our furniture on the main floor while our hardwoods were being refinished, took our furniture to their warehouse, came in and did a super deep cleaning, and then brought the furniture back and placed it where it was originally. Highly recommend their service!

reviews.name: Mark Edwards
reviews.reviewText: We had a small job after a minor water leak damaged a section of our ceiling. Covenant treated it with the same care and attention as if it had been a major job. Their office staff does a terrific job of staying in touch every step of the way and making sure I'm up to date on everything. The people who came to work on our ceiling were professional, friendly and knowledgeable about their craft. I can't say enough good things about them, and I'd rely on them again, if needed.

reviews.name: Brian Hargrave
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with expertise and customer  service.  Found my plumbing problem!

reviews.name: Carmen Clark-Stokes

reviews.reviewText: Called All Leak Detection LLC to find a leak on our water line.  Water company reported 25g+ leak per hour but no visible sign.  John arrived and very quickly found the leak.  Very professional, courteous, and very skilled.  A true godsend.  Next time I've got a leak, I'm calling him back.  If you got a leak, All Leak Detection is the one to call.

I would highly recommend for the quick fix jobs of a dripping faucet,  toilet changeout, etc. and/or the larger full remodel/new construction  I have used him on Both and my brother and father have also. Tissue was getting stuck to that and causing it to build up. They blasted it out and got it put back together in a short amount of time. They also fixed the sag. No more issues!

The only 'downside' I can think of is that Brian is usually very busy.  You might have to wait if your situation is not urgent, and might need to call back to remind him.  But, he is the one I call first when I have a plumbing problem.

He started the project and refused to stop and make a return visit the next day ! Extremely a professional attitude ! And much more patience with confined space and aggravating work situations than I have !
He took care of the problem and did an excellent job !!
I highly recommend EVANS PLUMBING !!!

* They keep everything neat and they clean up after the job is complete.

I would highly recommend LKE Plumbing and will use them again ~ 5 Stars!

He explained everything to me in ?non plumbing? terms and told me all of my options. It?s hard to find that! He was very honest when he quoted me estimates. When  he left my house, you could not even tell a plumber was here. It was spotless! I didn?t have to clean my bathrooms up and my carpet and hardwoods after him. I will ABSOLUTELY use him again!

I can?t say enough good things about Jared being a tremendous plumber but also a true professional that takes pride in his work and goes the extra mile to make sure his clients are completely satisfied with his work.

Mark & Diane Struthers

reviews.reviewText: I couldn?t have asked for a more honest and professional plumber. We recently bought an house and ran into problems the day after moving in. Jared switched tools and was able to pull out a 3? piece of metal that was stuck in our plumbing. Thank you for going above and beyond and helping us to FINALLY be able to enjoy our new home.

reviews.name: Megan Marion
reviews.reviewText: Words cannot express how Thankful I am for Jared coming out to replace my 30 year old hot water heater. I explained to him that my water was not getting hot and I thought that I could repair it by taking out the old heating elements and putting in new ones well that didn't work as planned and I had an even bigger leak. I sent Jared a picture of my old water heater and from his experience he was able to tell me that my water heater had been leaking for quite a while and suggested that it was time to get a new one if I was ready. We set up an appointment and he brought a new electric water heater (better quality and more efficient then lows and Hm dept) and installed it. He made the proper fitting adjustments to my old pipes. He also helped me locate my water meter so that he could turn off the water it was covered in 2 inches of dirt and he dug it out. He is very professional and polite (ma'am). Don't hesitate to contact this company. You will be satisfied with the end result and finally have hot water. Don't wait!!!!

He explained the diagnostic process so that I could understand what he was doing and why he was doing it. His work was thorough, careful, and he even insisted on cleaning up the floors throughout the house before he left. He went above and beyond and I appreciate everything he did and how exceptionally professional he was throughout! Very much worth the very reasonable cost and I will always use him for any other plumbing issue I encounter. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.reviewText: Jason's Drain Service did some work on our older home that included replacing a drain pipe under the house and installing a new pressure control valve. reviews.reviewText: I called Jason Drain service due to a slowly draining kitchen sink. They got out their jack hammer like tool and helped him out before they left.

reviews.name: Barry Durand
reviews.reviewText:
I recently used Jason?s Drain Service for 2 jobs.   Don?t let the name fool you, they do much more than drains. They replaced a hot water heater (job 1) and replaced the cartridges in both of my bathtub faucets (job 2).  Both faucets are working perfectly now and we have plenty of hot water. Their pricing is reasonable.

However, the best thing about them is their willingness to work with your schedule and punctuality. For both jobs, I asked them to come on a specific date. They can on the date requested and were here shortly after 8:00.  This is a drastic change from my previous plumber who was totally unreliable.

Jason also did not mind me standing over his shoulder and asking questions. He even stayed a couple of extra minutes to make sure that one faucet stopped dripping.

His prices are reasonable.  He is *extremely* fair with his pricing.

He is also very helpful with general information without charging for just a 5 minute conversation.

EDIT: I just used him for a third job.  He again was very punctual which was amazing given we are in the middle of a very hard freeze.  His price for today's job was more than fair.

I highly recommend Jason?s Drain Service.

reviews.name: Chris
reviews.reviewText: Joe replaced my water heater right after Christmas in 2016. He just did some minor work on my tub today. I have had experience with Roto Rooter trying to charge me extra for things that were not at all needed or related. Joe in both situations only did what was needed, and while he could easily have told me more was needed just to get money out of me, he was honest and didn't overcharge me. Integrity and skill are lost arts these days. I will continue to go with Professional Plumbing and recommend them to my friends and family.

reviews.name: John Taylor
reviews.reviewText: Day Plumbing was very responsive and professional, and provided services at a reasonable price.  Our main line was clogged and Day Plumbing returned our call the next day after we called and came out that afternoon. Danny and a Jimmy was a welcome site and got to work right away to unblock the clogged drain line. After the first pass, they waited around to ensure the clog was cleared, but it started backing up again.  So they ran their equipment again and cleared the line again. Said it was because of the heating and cooling of the grease in the line that it sometimes causes repeated clearing. After running hot water down the drain for an extended period of time, the drain appears to be working fine. While waiting to ensure water didn?t back up again, Danny and Jimmy went the extra mile and cleaned our bathroom and shower drains as I was concerned they might be getting clogged up. All in all, they did a great job and at a reasonable cost, and were very timely with coming out to fix the drain. Oh, would be remiss if I didn?t mention great customer service that Jeanette provided over the phone. Thank you Day Plumbing.

reviews.name: chelsea mattice
reviews.reviewText: Very professional and honest I?ll recommend this company to anyone!

reviews.name: Audri
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend Day Plumbing! They were at my home within a couple of hours of me calling to install my hot water heater. Will definitely use them for future plumbing needs!

reviews.name: Howard Snider
reviews.reviewText: We have had problems with water pressure at our Lake Martin cabin for years.  A local plumbing company came out a few months ago and couldn?t find the problem.  They just gave up, but things got worse to where we barely had a trickle of water at times.  I contacted a large plumbing company in Montgomery, but they recommended Danny Day and told me he does quality work at a price that would be considerably lower than theirs.  How right they were.  He persisted until he found and replaced a faulty pressure regulator and also found and repaired a long-standing leak in a copper pipe.  Our water pressure is now better than it has ever been.  His charge was considerably less than I was expecting and probably a third of what one of the large companies would have charged.  He is an old-fashioned plumber who treats his customers the way he would want to be treated.  I recommend him highly.

reviews.name: James Williamson
reviews.reviewText:
Glen came to our house and wrote up an initial free estimate two days early at the end of his business day for which we were grateful considering an associated time constraint. The job consisted of replacing the entire sewer line running around the house to the city tap at the road. This was a very extensive job given the length of run, proximity to two enormous oak trees (within 15 ft) and the age of the house/sewer (1948). He beat two other companies in price by alot which was initially alarming due to the complexity. He spent all day battling roots, antiquated sewage design and the sheer depth of the trench needed for such a long run. We had good flow the first day and didn't have to leave for showers that night. He capped off the cleanouts by 9 the next morning and was technically done. We also had a preexisting issue with a bathroom sink which was not in the scope of the job we agreed on, yet he came in, troubleshot the issue and determined that it couldn't be fixed immediately due to an unrelated issue.

Glen truly does fantastic, affordable work in a timely and transparent manner. He will get the job done right.

We were told that Glen was good at getting into tight small places, and he was indead. Glen was very thorough and actually found that the leak was inside an access panel in the house the whole time. I highly recommend Glen at Southside Plumbing. He was even very comfortable with my dogs. Thank you Glen!

reviews.reviewText:

He came after the trip, and I am one happy camper! I have the best stove and even better,  I have the best plumber in town! Allen, you know I had to mention the fishing trip!!! All is well in the Ledbetter home now. Cooking with gas and loving it! Allen, Allen, he our man, if he can't do it ,no one can!!!

reviews.name: kris
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough wonderful things about Eden. I met him a year ago and seen him refuse to do shady stuff a contractor wanted him to do. He does things the correct way. I've personally hired him several times since. He's fixed many issues. He's told me things that I suspected that I was lied too by previous workers and he confirmed it. He's always been on time. He's always gotten back to me. He's always done an amazing job. Both him and his worker clean up after themselves and even put those shoe booties on to keep our floors clean. He's fixed so much that the previous plumbers totally did wrong. Tonight, one of the things the other plumber did wrong that we haven't touched yet (bathroom isn't used nor finished yet. ) we didn't know it was wrong. It hasn't been tiled yet so we didn't have Eden in there yet. Well, it sprung a crazy leak because the previous plumber never capped it right. Eden called me right back and walked us through what to do until he comes tomorrow.  In my panic, I even forgot I can turn the water off for the house. He walked us through that and stopped the bathroom from flooding. I am so grateful to him and look forward to having him back here. We're currently in a new build that after 3 years still isn't done and so much done wrong. I wish the contractor had Eden from the begining. I wish I knew him from the begining because I would have insisted on having him. I wish there were more honest and ethical and good people like him.

We hired a company before him that charged us $725 and after two visits of un clogging the pipes. The day the previous plumber  left the toilets' were bubbling again. So never fixed.

So we decided to go with Pipeworx. He unclogged the pipes in 20 minutes and found what was causing the issue. It was an object that was wedged in our pipes. That our previous plumber we hired did not find. On top of that was 60 percent cheaper as well.

Very friendly, responsive, reliable, and very affordable prices.

Also checked the next day to see everything was still running smoothly and it was!

reviews.name: Senordor Hines, Sr
reviews.reviewText:
All around Honesty, Integrity and Professionalism seem to be trademark with this company.

I called Hammock plumbing about a main line water leak around 8:20 am. I had to leave a message. Around 8:50 am, Donna called me back. She very courteously explained why she didn't answer initially. We then discussed my issue. She forwarded my information to Joe & Jake Hammock. They were already working in my area and by 9:20 they were at my home. They asked me a few questions and started working. Most importantly, thy explained what they were doing while doing it. ??  A Family company that treats you like family.
The job was totally finished by 10:05 am??.
I have to say that they are true professionals. If more stars were possible, I'd rate them higher. Not only will I use them in the future,
I will certainly recommend Hammock Plumbing Co to my network.

Roll Tide ?
Senordor Hines

reviews.reviewText: They were just phenomenal. My water heater burst without warning, and I was genuinely distraught at the thought of the cost. I called them after seeing these reviews. They were kind and quick, diagnosed the problem right away, and were very very affordable. I could cry with relief. Thank you thank you thank you!

reviews.name: Sanchez Johnson
reviews.reviewText: I tried two other companies before finding out about Hammock Plumbing. Boy have I wished I called them first. They are some of the most courteous, professional, and reliable people you will ever meet. They definitely go above and beyond!! They are going to make certain you're straight. I told them they are family now :) Thank you for all you do!!

reviews.name: David Gullett
reviews.reviewText:
These guys showed up when they said they would. They replaced about 60 feet of water line (which included digging up the old line, and covering up the new line) from our meter to our house, put our pressure reducing valve in the correct place, and installed a cutoff valve in 1 hr and 15 minutes. And, $2000.00 less than the Company that we were originally gonna have do it.
Give these guys a call if you some plumbing done. Ms. Donna was awesome too. She kept us informed about the process.
Thanks guys.

reviews.name: Margie Davis
reviews.reviewText: I called and spoke with Ms Donna about a water leak. She was so friendly and said she would call me back when they were available. Within 15 minutes she called and said they were on the way and I  think from my call and completion of the job was about an hour.  Found two leaks and within minutes they were repaired. Thanks for the prompt service and caring courteous people. Will call again for sure.

reviews.name: Dee h
reviews.reviewText:
This is the second time I called them for help. The day before New Years Eve, 2021, they came &  fixed an outside frozen busted water pipe. The job was completed in a quick professional manner. I expected to be  charged a high holiday price but no. I was amazed at the normal rate. Unfortunately, i forgot to post a review for that job.

Therefore, today I am using this opportunity to give them a well deserved 5* rating for both jobs. Yesterday late in the evening, I ran over an outside water faucet with my truck. Of course, I called my favorite plumbers today & they arrived about 2hrs later.
These guys are friendly experienced professionals. They completed the job quickly & at a very reasonable price.
Thank you!

reviews.name: Vanessa Redondo
reviews.reviewText: I called at 1:00PM and they were at my house in 20 minutes.  Found the leak in the main waterline and repaired in less than an hour.  Highly Recommend!

reviews.reviewText: I called the office at 1:00 pm and they were at my house by 3:00 pm. They replaced my sink drains and replaced all the pipes under my sink. Very nice and knowledgeable.  5 stars +

reviews.reviewText: Wonderful service and nice people! The only plumbers that I will use- Always very quick service, always will recommend Hammock Plumbing!

reviews.name: Regina Turner
reviews.reviewText: Water was standing in the front yard and flower bed and previous plumber had no clue and said it was from rain - rain? It hadn?t rained in a week. Called Hammock - spoke with Ms Donna and was informed they?d be out after lunch, on the same day and they arrived right as she said. They arrived and automatically said it was a water leak, found the leak and repaired it. By far, one of the best services I?ve ever experienced. I?d highly recommend this company to anyone. The customer service was amazing and the guys were respectful and replaced the flower bed as if it was never disturbed. If you have any plumbing issues, please do not hesitate to give them a call.

reviews.reviewText: Fast and courteous! I had an emergency leak in the wall and Donna put me down to call if an appointment came open from a cancellation. Lo and behold, one did. The team got here quick and were really fast in getting everything fixed for me. They made me feel at ease and identified the problem quickly and got it sorted faster than any other plumber I have seen. The price was fair and they went above and beyond to insure this kind of leak would never happen again! So happy with their service, will definitely use them again!

reviews.reviewText: Came out and replaced my water heater. Very reasonable pricing, super kind and helpful. I?ll gladly recommend/ use them in the future.

reviews.reviewText: Contacted these guys and they came out the next day to take a look at my non-emergency issue. Got a reasonable quote for the work, compared with multiple other plumbers. These guys were the only ones to mention what might be needed to bring my system up to code. Also, they suggested another guy to do a repair that no one else had suggested instead of replacing something. Saved me 3-5k. They ALSO went out and helped my sister with an emergency call about a leak in a water line. We both agreed that these guys were professional, nice, honest, and diligent in their work. Will ? use these guys again. Thank you!

reviews.reviewText: They were perfect. The price was right. They were on time. Just everything you need in a plumbing service. This is my second time using them. Without hesitation, I highly recommend Hammock. You will be satisfied. Guaranteed.

reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend. After doing a thorough check, the plumber took the time to explain to me what was causing my issue. He was very professional. I will definitely be following that advice when it is feasible economically for me (translation: I'm broke). Thankfully it didn't need to be replaced, just the heating elements (not sure if that's the correct term). The price did not make me pass out and I was able to cancel my appointment to donate plasma (translation: very affordable).  DEFINITELY WILL USE THEM AGAIN AND RECOMMEND!!!

reviews.reviewText:
Today was day 4 of no hot water I called rotor rooter and they showed up to check today....
..are water heater  was busted we needed a new one. They quoted us at 2,700 I almost pasted out as they left to go get the parts my husband and I scrambled to try and figure out how we were going to come up with $2,700 in like 4 hours...I went outside sat in my chair completely lost....i looked up and noticed a truck in my neighbors driveway it was a sign from god it was a plumber...I walked over and asked hey do you think you can check something  before we get totally screwed he said sure....came in and  yup you need a new one and quoted us at half the price I almost fell into his arms crying out of pure joy he's a great guy very friendly and honest I would give him 10 stars of it would let me he removed and replaced our water heater in less then 3 hours I hope he reads this thank you Joe you saved us today in a big way and we couldn't be more greatful.
...also Bella says hi she misses u sorry about her stealing your tools lol if anyone needs a plumber he's your man!!!!

reviews.reviewText: We called them regarding dishwasher repair and faucet installation. The faucet was leaking, we had bought a new one. Told us our Moen was warranted for life. Repaired it. Great service. Also put in a pressure regulator so we wouldn't keep having leaks. Highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewText: Great customer service and price on my water heater install! From when I spoke to Donna on the phone to when the gentlemen showed up at my door, the service was great! I had another plumber originally come out and their estimate was $700 (!!!!) more than what Hammock charged me and the OTHER plumber rolled his eyes when I told him the water heater was in the attic. I'm so thankful, that I called Hammock and received not only a great price but great service as well. They even insisted on vacuuming up some attic debris!

reviews.name: Dalton Urda [Student]
reviews.reviewText: This company  is fantastic! I would recommend them to absolutely everyone! Our Home Warranty and other plumber made a complete mess out of everything and these guys fixed everything in less than an hour!

reviews.name: Robert Ammons
reviews.reviewText: I woke to find a pipe had burst on my main water line in the front yard to the house - deep freeze for a few days.  I called to try and get them to come out, but they were booked solid with the same issues all over the area.  Keep in mind this was a pipe (pressure regulator) they installed earlier the summer before.  To my surprise, they had a 30 minute window between jobs and they chose to come look over my problem!  They found it was not any of the work they had done but instead was cause by the original hardware install when the house was built.  They proceeded to repair the leak in record time.  Most importantly, they did not charge me for the repair even though it was somebody else?s mistake AND they were super busy!  These guys are solid customer experts and master plumbers.  You won?t go wrong giving them a call and they are worth the wait.  Don?t make a mistake - call these guys for all plumbing needs!

reviews.name: Beth Scott
reviews.reviewText: From the first phone call, Hammock Plumbing proved the perfect choice for my needs.  They made my appointment, followed up a couple of days before and called when they were on the way.  The father and son team fixed my issue quickly and efficiently without leaving a mess! I?ve already recommended them to friends.

reviews.name: Linda Amos
reviews.reviewText: Professional and response.  Hot water heater went out and on a Saturday,  Mr. Hammock arrived at the scheduled time, looked at the old, went and got the new and installed it quickly.  I worked out of town for many years and trusted them to perform only the needed functions for my family and they did.  If it is not needed or warranted, they will not do the work unless you insist.  My wife and I know we can trust them to be fair and professional.  No need to call anyone else.

reviews.name: Jon G
reviews.reviewText: This company has been absolutely wonderful! We recently bought a home and were told the tank had been pumped a year ago but the previous owners could not provide any info on when it was down or who did it. We didn?t have issues with our system but wanted to have it inspected/pumped just to make sure it was cared for. This team was able to get out to pump it 3 days after our call (it was not an emergency so I was more than happy to wait) they showed up early in the day and got the whole job completed within an hour. They showed me the tank after it was uncovered and were told it looks like it has NEVER been pumped! They were all professional and friendly, gave me advice on how to care for the tank life long as I have never had a septic tank before. They explained in great detail what to watch for and how often to have it pumped, they never tried to upsell me even though it would have been easy as I have no idea about anything septic lol they stood firm on their quote they gave me via email and were even reluctant to take a tip because they didn?t feel it was necessary. If you want an honest and friendly company that doesn?t try to milk you for money this is the one to go with! Even though they were very busy they didn?t seem inconvenienced by all of my questions 10/10 recommend

reviews.name: Mr. Moore
reviews.reviewText: I have so many good things to say about this company. From Tina (who I?ve learned is the Mom) to her son, Gage who was the guy who came to service our septic system, they were amazing. We moved into a new house a week ago and our septic stopped draining. Gage came out and pumped us and inspected the system. He confirmed it?s not draining. Gave me number to call to have new field lines drawn up then call all pro back to do the service. I have 4 sons and my toddler asks a lot of questions. Gage answered everything. He was very professional and kind. What would usually be a super stressful experience, this company is making me feel confident that it will be fine and they will handle it. Also the pricing!!!! I called 5 different septic companies to get my septic pumped and service and every quote was over 500$ to pump. Some even said it would be another 100$ to dig to be able to pump. My husband is military and dug it before he left the country. All pro came out and after military discount I was only charged 275$ for pumping and inspecting it. If you have septic issues just do yourself a favor and hire All Pro. Photo is my husband thinking he could fix the problem himself ?

The way my tank was situated was kinda up underneath my concrete porch. Which was a problem for some. But not for Jamie, he quickly uncovered the lid with his mini Digger. And got to work with quality equipment. He paid attention to every detail of my tank and saw I had a a slight problem a plastic baffle piece and fixed it and also applied a new filter too.
The clean up of the yard was also great too. He made sure all dirt was back to ground level smooth.
I would highly recommend this company again and he and my family will continue you use him until he quits the business.
This company is not out just to suck your tank out and leave. They truly want to do what?s right and make sure you are taken care of.

reviews.reviewText: I called to setup an appointment for our house closing inspection and the guy said he would check his calendar and get back with me. I started laughing and said it wasn't me but that I really needed him to come out and do an inspection for our house closing but I had no clue what size out tank was or how many we had in our yard. The guy scheduled me for that day because he wasn't busy and he came right out to the house. Super nice guy. He looked at our tank and explained to me what size I had and how many and gave me a quote before he started any work. Great communicator! He and his brother did a quality service. You can pay cash, check or card. He had a glitch with his new square reader but I helped him figure it out and then he got excited and we started laughing about it. All in all it was a great experience. Quality service, a very timely manner, quality work, great prices! What more can you ask for!? Definitely call these guys again and I recommend them to anybody around!

reviews.name: Leah Cruz
reviews.reviewText:
Miss Sandy is a SAINT!!! And a literal wealth of knowledge?I have never learned so much about septic systems and I owned a septic home for 10 years prior to this one.

For awareness, we bought our home nearly a year and a half ago and have had sporadic septic issues ever since. We used a different company to pump once and they didn?t even reinstall caps properly.

One call to Miss Sandy and not only did her team respond to pump immediately ? she personally showed up to discuss our concerns. Then, she took it upon herself to find our original septic approval plans, theorize potential causes for our issues, and give us advice/a way forward. She isn?t coming in to make radical, costly repair suggestions, she is truly coming in to get to the root of the issue through the best means possible.

Long and short, she isn?t in the business to make a quick buck on her costumer ? it?s the exact opposite. She truly values and cares about each person she?s called to aid and will exhaust every viable effort with the least amount of cost and disruption. She is clearly driven by morality, integrity and hard work. We will never even consider doing business with any one else.

If you need help with septic routine mx and/or woes as well as install?this is literally the only business you should call!

reviews.name: Jesse Addis
reviews.reviewText: Our septic system started acting up last night.  Toilets and showers bubbling anytime you run any water for any reason.  We are not originally from here so we looked around online and went with them for the five star reviews we saw.  My wife called them the next morning they quoted a very reasonable price and came out earlier than expected.  Turned out we were about one flush away from it backing up into the house.  I didn't get the chance to meet them because I was at work but from what I was told, I wish I did.  They had to do a bit more work than just a standard pumping but still were willing to stick to the original quoted price.  She told me they were so friendly and professional and efficient that she agreed to pay them the higher amount anyway.  Alot of people could have chosen to rake her over the coals telling her they had to dig up the whole drain field or some major catastrophe.  She just had a heart attack and no one deserves that anyway.  I didn't meet them but I can't express in words how thankful I am for this company and the service they provided.  With honesty, courtesy and professionalism.  I would recommend them to anyone and everyone who needs any septic services.  Couldn't be happier.  I wouldn't even think of calling anyone else.  You guys have our business for as long as we have this tank.  Thank you and God Bless!
